title: 608: TOP TRADER PREDICTS MASSIVE BITCOIN AND ETHEREUM RALLIES FOR SECOND HALF OF THIS YEAR!!
description:
Top Crypto trader predicts giant rallies for Bitcoin & Ethereum before the turn of the new year, but there’s a catch. The analyst lays out gargantuan predictions for BTC & ETH in the coming months.

Among other things, Kaleo predicts that before 2022 rolls around, Bitcoin shatters $100,000 and Ethereum breaks through $10,000, all while altcoins rally hard.

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
